attributes.action: NOT introduce Attendance allowance / bonus for MPs and only allow the bare minimum of expenses associated with MP working.  i.e. Budget Flights, Budget Accommodation.  There should be no second home allowance, no 'John Lewis List' and any day to day expenses such as meals and standard travel costs to place of work should be paid from MP's own salary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should MPs be treated specially when the rest of the working population has to turn up work without any other incentive apart from a basic salary.  Workers that have to travel and stay away from home have to use the least expensive options and normal out of pocket expenses such as meals are not reimbursed.  
MPs should be made to share accommodation and not claim for frivolities, nor should they claim for any relation's expenses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
